folder_structure_prompt.system: You are an AI assistant specialized in creating well-organized folder structures for businesses. All folder names and file names must be in English. You must respond with ONLY valid JSON data without any other text before or after. Do not include any explanations, remarks, or messages surrounding the JSON. Do not wrap the JSON in code blocks or markdown formatting.

json_fix_prompts.fix_json:
The following JSON structure is invalid or could not be correctly parsed.
Please fix the structure and return valid JSON format.
Ensure all keys and values are properly quoted and all brackets are balanced.

Problematic response:
{failed_response}

Please return only the corrected JSON structure without additional explanation.

IMPORTANT: All folder names must be in English. Do not translate them to other languages.

json_format_instructions.json_format_instruction: Please format your response as a valid JSON object with proper braces and quotes. All folder names must be in English.
json_format_instructions.json_array_instruction: Please ONLY return the {key} as a JSON array. Return ONLY the {key} data.
json_format_instructions.json_object_instruction: Please ONLY return the {key} as a JSON object. Return ONLY the {key} data.
json_format_instructions.json_structure_hint: The JSON should contain only the '{key}' data, either as an array or as an object. All folder names must be in English.
json_format_instructions.json_error_message: There was an error parsing your previous response. Please ensure you provide a syntactically valid JSON object with proper braces. All folder names must be in English.
json_format_instructions.structure_error_message: The JSON MUST include these keys: {keys}. All folder names must be in English.
json_format_instructions.structure_error_format: IMPORTANT: JSON must include the following keys: {keys}. All folder names must be in English.
json_format_instructions.parsing_error_message: IMPORTANT: There was an error parsing your previous response. Please provide a valid JSON object with correct braces. All folder names must be in English.

cli_args.min_files: Minimum number of files per folder (default: 3)

date_formats.role_prompt: You are creating a folder structure for a {role} working in this industry.
date_formats.date_range_prompt: Include appropriate date-based folders and filenames that would be relevant for the time period from {start_date} to {end_date}.
date_formats.date_organization_prompt: Consider organizing time-sensitive documents in a chronological structure with separate folders for different years ({start_year}-{end_year}) and potentially quarters/months within those years where appropriate.
date_formats.existing_structure_prompt:
Please build upon or complement the following existing folder structure. Create compatible new content that would make sense alongside this structure:
{structure}
date_formats.document_date_prompt: This document is dated {date}. Include this date in the document header/title and ensure all content is appropriate for this date. Reference this date throughout the document where relevant.
date_formats.spreadsheet_date_prompt: This spreadsheet is dated {date}. Include this date in the spreadsheet header and ensure all data is appropriate for this time period. If this is a report or tracking document, include dates within the spreadsheet that are on or before {date}.
date_formats.text_date_prompt: This text file is dated {date}. Include this date in the file content and ensure all information is appropriate for this date.
date_formats.scenario_date_range_prompt: The time period is from {start_date} to {end_date}.

{scenario}
